comments: Prof currently teaching at LAVC, she RAWKS! I dunno what\'s up w/bad reviews, taking her online class is awesome! Very creative, u have to think w/out relying too much on book, kinda "outta the box". Prof also teaching addl classes that\'s why it takes 2 wks for grading, it\'s part of the "system". Responds to emails w/in 2-3 days. Happiness :-)
BEST PROFESSOR EVER!!!

Love this class. Really pretty and funny teacher. Gives good extra credit and does a lot of stuff on her own time like on a tour of a jail, to a play, and got a lot of us involved in the soc club. It was a lot of fun. I\'m actually going to miss this class alot.

This was the BEST class i have ever taken!! Her teaching style does use a lot of class discussion, so if you don\'t like that it might not be the class for you (but i perfer that to just straight lecture). Also, we nevr got out early, only the class the night before Thanksgiving, so anyway, i will take every class prof scott teaches from now on!!

Easy A is right! This teacher is new and doesn\'t have a clue what is going on. Most of the time we just read the book, did very simple projects and got let out early. I guess she read enough comments on here and got inspired to improve. Her inexperience is your gain. EASY A! TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!

I wouldn\'t suggest anyone taking this course if you are trying to learn anything beyond what the textbook has to offer. Try another Professor, there are some other pretty good ones to choose from. Goodluck!
If I were given the opportunity again, I would not take this professor, she lacks experience and insight.
This professor is not that bad, but she is not a great techer either.
I am a Sociology major and I have to agree as well that this professor is dry and boring.
Great class, prof Scott is really funny and down to earth. The way she teaches makes sociology interesting. She makes me think...she\'s cute too.
Great teacher got me to think about changing my major to sociology

This professor is all over the place. Half of the time she doesn\'t seem like she is even aware of what she is doing and just ask the students to read the book. I noticed that someone below gave her all 5\'s because she lets us out early and gives all EASY work. This is not the way to learn in COLLEGE!

WOW I see other students feel the same way I do about this professor. I wish I would have dropped the class while I still had time to find another class, but I am going to stick it out. But to the students who come after me BEWARE this is not the professor to take!
I don\'t know what some of these people are talking about. Professor Scott was a clear and interesting teacher. If you didn\'t learn anything its probably has more to do with you then her teaching.

I had to drop this class because I wasn\'t learning a thing. Please be advised that all you will do in this class is read the book and waste money and time. Avoid at all cost!!!This Professor is definetely inexperienced and should find another method of teaching.

"Inexperienced" is the best way to describe this professor. I feel like I did not learn anything from this class. Everything is sturctured completely around the book so make sure you purchase and read every single page! Please be aware that you will be teaching yourself straight out of the book. Avoid at all cost!

I loved taking this class. You really wont regret it. Just because she is new doesnt mean shes a bad teacher. The tests are pretty easy you just have to pay attention during class and read the pages she assigns in your textbook.

She is a very easy professor and is great at what she does. She gets out the information in an easy way and tests are really easy. We got to leave class early every time and she was always willing to offer extra help. Easy A and a great atmosphere. She will inspire you. Take her, you wont regret it.

I\'m currently taking her at LAVC. She is lively, passionate and funny. An overall joy to be in her class, which is saying a ton because it is from 6:45-9:55. Great methods, offers lots of EC. Doesn\'t try to trick you on tests. Pay attention in class and read the chapters and you will be golden.
I have to disagree. Prof Scott is very enthusiastic, keeps the class interesting, and you can tell she really loves teaching. I would take any class Professor Scott teaches.
